column4: BRIEF-HP joins Coca-Cola  Microsoft in declining to donate to Republican National Convention-NYT

column4: Vista Equity Partners to buy Marketo for $1.79 billion
column5: Marketo Inc   a maker of cloud-based marketing software  said on Tuesday it agreed to be bought by private equity firm Vista Equity Partners  in a cash deal valued at about $1.79 billion.

column4: UPDATE 1-Vista Equity Partners to buy Marketo for $1.79 bln
column5: May 31 Marketo Inc  a maker of cloud-based marketing software  said on Tuesday it agreed to be bought by private equity firm Vista Equity Partners  in a cash deal valued at about $1.79 billion.

column4: BRIEF-Tesla CEO says has faced bigger challenges than Model 3 ramp
column5: * Tesla CEO Elon Musk told shareholders the company had made "bigger leaps" in the past than ramping up its production now for Model 3 demand. Musk spoke during the company's 2016 annual shareholder meeting in Mountain View  California.  Further company coverage:    (Reporting by Alexandria Sage)
